New Records: Ketel Marte had a 20-game postseason hit streak, setting a record for the Diamondbacks
Key Match Events: Diamondbacks' bullpen struggled in Game 1 and Game 4, allowing key home runs and defensive miscues
Mistakes by Christian Walker and Alek Thomas in defense led to runs in Game 5
Post-Match Reflections: Diamondbacks manager Torey Lovullo expressed pride in the team's effort and journey
Players like Ketel Marte and Christian Walker reflected on their performance and the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Diamondbacks had one of baseball's best defenses in the regular season but struggled in the World Series
Team emphasized the importance of learning from the experience for future success
